country.name: Chad
country.overview: Chad, officially the Republic of Chad, is a landlocked country in Central Africa. It is bordered by Libya to the north, Sudan to the east, the Central African Republic to the south, Cameroon and Nigeria to the southwest, and Niger to the west.

translations.name: ချဒ်သမ္မတနိုင်ငံ

geography.area_note: slightly more than three times the size of California
geography.climate: tropical in south, desert in north
geography.terrain: broad, arid plains in center, desert in north, mountains in northwest, lowlands in south
geography.hazards: hot, dry, dusty harmattan winds occur in north; periodic droughts; locust plagues

languages.name: Algerian Saharan Arabic
languages.maps: Algeria, Morocco, Tunisia and Western Sahara
